summary: The diff only modifies `project_state.json` (project metadata) and shows no frontend/backend code changes that would revert the breaking change or fix deployment/preview behavior. Therefore REQ-16 is not implemented in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Undo (revert) the most recent product/code change that triggered the current deployment error, then redeploy the application so the live Preview loads successfully without deployment errors (including 5-step flow working end-to-end, final heading exactly "So Shruti ❤️....", and no console errors/warnings).
missing_requirements.reason: No application source files were changed; only `project_state.json` was modified, which does not evidence a revert of the breaking change or any fix to deployment/preview/runtime behavior.
